commandDescription: Embeds attached files and creates self-contained json
pricelistidFlagDescription: replace ALL references to pricelists in model with this ID
inputdirFlagDescription: input directory to read metadata.json and relative links
modelnameFlagDescription: Name of model (directory) to read metadata.json inside
idmapFlagDescription: idmap.json file path, to store/load <csvId:targetId> pairs
